name: Stupid Cupid
detailed_description:
You messed up bad this time, Cupid #0201-8035-0737-C. You had one too many at the office party last night and got a little trigger-happy. People who should not be falling in love, are. Oops! The worst part: your boss (and technically, mom) Venus is not impressed. Now your job is on the line. Welcome to Cupid Co.

Help Cupid get back in Venus’ good graces and make up for his drunken mistakes in this VR game. Use his bow and arrow to balance the natural order by helping animals mate, or in some cases, culling the overpopulation. Challenge your skills and accuracy in different locations and seasons. Remember to watch out for those environmental "accidents”!

Features
  • Unique gameplay - A fun, quirky world where players can try their hand at doing Cupid's job.
  • Original sound effects & music - Created by our talented team!
  • Game accessibility - Easily understood game principles.

short_description: Help Cupid #0201-8035-0737-C get back in Venus’ good graces in this VR game! Use his bow and arrow to balance the natural order by helping animals mate, or in some cases, culling the overpopulation. Challenge your skills and accuracy in different locations and seasons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Equivalent or Greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
